headline: Principal Asset Management Extends Relationship with SS&C
summary: SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SSNC) today announced that Principal Asset Management has extended its transfer agency relationship with SS&C. Principal Asset Management is the investment management division of Principal Financial Group (Nasdaq: PFG). SS&C Global Investor & Distribution Solutions will provide a full range of fund services to Principal's 114 mutual funds comprised of 467 mutual and retail alternatives share classes, with approximately $160 billion in assets under manage

raw.headline: Principal Asset Management Extends Relationship with SS&C
raw.summary: SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. (Nasdaq: SSNC) today announced that Principal Asset Management has extended its transfer agency relationship with SS&C. Principal Asset Management is the investment management division of Principal Financial Group (Nasdaq: PFG). SS&C Global Investor & Distribution Solutions will provide a full range of fund services to Principal's 114 mutual funds comprised of 467 mutual and retail alternatives share classes, with approximately $160 billion in assets under manage
